page.title: 19CHARLTON-H.SOCIAL CONCERNS 2
page.content:
{INFORMATION SYSTEM
NATIONAL NEWSPAPERS ARE DELIVERED DAILY TO THE DOOR AND FREQUENT NATIONAL AND LOCAL NEWS BULLETINS ARE RECEIVED BY RADIO AND TELEVISION SETS. A MOBILE LIBRARY VISITS EACH VILLAGE FORTNIGHTLY AND CHARLTON AND HANKERTON PRODUCE BIMONTHLY PARISH MAGAZINES ALSO DELIVERED TO THE DOOR. LOCAL EVENTS IN CHARLTON ARE PUBLICISED IN A NEWS LETTER DELIVERED MONTHLY. { {"MEALS ON WHEELS"
SOME OLD AND INFIRM PEOPLE IN THE AREA HAVE "MEALS ON WHEELS" DELIVERED THESE ARE COOKED IN THE HOMES OF LOCAL VOLUNTEERS.
